viewData.name: PhiLashes Beyond Lash Adhesive
viewData.short_description: A very fast setting intended for advanced technicians.┬áATTENTION: Only for professional use.
viewData.long_description: A very fast setting intended for advanced technicians. ATTENTION: Only for professional use. Keep out of reach of children. Contact directly on the skin or eye can sometimes cause slight irritation. In case of allergy, please contact your doctor. Keep the container tightly closed. Do not store in direct sunlight or in a cool place. Optimum temperature for extensions is 25-28 degrees Celsius, with humidity of RH 50-70%. The Beyond Lash adhesive is suitable for the professional level. The drying time is 1-2 seconds. Retention: 5-6 weeks
